ComicInfo.Title: Borne Again, Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
WITCHBLADE NO MORE!
Sara Pezzini violently ripped the Witchblade from her body and abandoned it. For Sara to begin her life anew, the Witchblade must find and bond with a new host. But not all who wield the Witchblade are worthy to bear the burden of the gauntlet.
ComicInfo.Characters: Jackie Estacado,Mayor Maguire,Witchblade,The Angelus,Kevin Pilcher,Kenneth Irons,Detective Gleason,Jenny Romano,Magdalena,Alisa Spencer,Hope Pezzini,Sara Pezzini,Kate Rooney
